sourcesContent: import r,{useMemo as i}from"react";import a from"./grid-item";import t from"../utils/clsx";import c from"../utils/with-defaults";import{jsx as e}from"react/jsx-runtime";const s=({gap:r,wrap:c,css:s,children:o,className:n,...p})=>{const l=i((()=>`calc(${r} * $space$3)`),[r]);return e(a,{className:t("nextui-grid-container",n),css:{$$gridGapUnit:l,display:"flex",flexWrap:c,boxZizing:"border-box",margin:"calc(-1 * $$gridGapUnit)",width:"calc(100% + $$gridGapUnit * 2)",...s},...p,children:o})};s.toString=()=>".nextui-grid-container";export default c(s,{gap:0,wrap:"wrap",className:""});
